TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DataObjectPastingEventHandler(object sender, DataObjectPastingEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DataObjectPastingEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DataObjectPastingEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DataObjectPastingEventArgs)
public delegate void DataObjectPastingEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DataObjectPastingEventArgs ^ e);
type DataObjectPastingEventHandler = delegate of obj * DataObjectPastingEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件处理程序所附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示将处理 附加事件的方法。

span.span: Represents a method that will handle the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当粘贴操作选择了要粘贴的数据格式，但在实际粘贴数据之前，将发生附加事件。The attached event occurs when a paste operation has selected a data format to paste, but before the data is actually pasted. 通常由附加事件处理程序执行的操作包括：Actions typically performed by a attached event handler include: - 通过设置属性的新值更改所选粘贴格式。Change the selected paste format by setting new value for the property. - 将自定义数据格式应用于粘贴所选内容。Apply a custom data format to the paste selection. - 创建一个新的，并将其分配给的`e`属性。Create a new , and assign it to the property of `e`. 原始数据对象的只读副本存储在中。A read-only copy of the original data object is stored in . - 通过调用取消粘贴操作。Cancel the paste operation by calling . > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果更改了粘贴格式，则处理程序方法负责确保新选择的粘贴格式可供粘贴目标使用。If the paste format is changed, the handler method is responsible for ensuring that a newly selected paste format is consumable by the paste target.
